title: 2011 Hyundai Equus Signature
notes: This video was a ton of fun to make. I experimented with using B-roll footage to compliment the vehicle, as well as to hide the vehicle leading up to the final full body beauty shot.  I experimented with using some of the vehicles automated features to help convey a better sense of motion to the shots beyond just the camera moving.  I experimented with performing a quick reverse backing away from the camera, then reversed the footage to make it appear as though the car was speeding towards the camera instead.  I experimented with filming from several new angles that I had not tried before including of the car driving down the road as well as having the camera mounted to the top of the vehicle while it was in motion.

title: 2007 Toyota FJ Cruiser
notes: I experimented with a zoom in then out transiton for the video.

title: Wayne's Candied Apples
notes: I experimented with making one video that featured all the vehicles in inventory of a specific color. I also experimented with cutting and splicing the video in such a way as to allow me to film and drive the vehicles.  I experimented with more subtle information graphics. I also experimented with adding additional financing information instead of limiting it to just vehicle information. I also experimented with using animated graphics.

title: 2011 Ford F-150 SVT Raptor
notes: Experimented with adjusting video speed and transitions to sync with audio cues from background music.  Experimented with using 4wheeler in filming to help achieve a quick approach shot.

title: 2010 Lexus RX 450 Hybrid
notes: I experimented with using a single shot walk around followed by drastic zoom out.  I also experimented with driving shots looking out both the front windshield as well as the sunroof as it opened.

title: 2002 Lexus SC 430
notes: Expeimented with revering video to get convertible top to dance with background music.  I tried to focus primarily on the woodgrain patter that was present throughtout the interior of the vehicle.

title: 2013 Ford F-150 SuperCrew
notes: I experimented with under the vehicle shots as I drove over the camera.  I experimented with filming the driver wheel while driving.  I experimented with using both softer as well as more abrupt transitions to help convey a sense of excitement and motion. I also experimented with having the vehicle pull the ending logo out of the background.

title: Wayne's Muscle Cars
notes: I experimented with not using music or information graphics but instead opted to record and edit my own audio in an attempt to get let the vehicle engine sound itself speak to the potential new owners.

title: 2008 Hummer H3 Alpha
notes: I experimented with mounting the camera to the side of the vehicle to film the exterior while in motion.  I also experimented with the information graphics slightly in an attempt to make them more appealing.

title: 2014 Lincoln Navigator L
notes: I experimented with different openeing titles, next to ground filming while in motion, animated information graphics and vehicle fly through shots. I also experimented with incorporating polished mirrored surfaces as well as the surounding foilage of plants to help showcase the beauty of the vehicle.

title: 2015 Lexus IS 250
notes: I experimented with using a reversed beauty shot as well as mirrored beginning and ending shots. I also used the open sunroof in order to film a bird's eye view of the driver portion of the passenger compartment.

title: 2012 Ford Mustang
notes: I expermineted with using a darker style of music to accentuate the vehicles aggressive beauty.  I also experimented with using multiple cameras in multiple angles that were later edited together to get a better depth to the video.

title: 2006 Ford F-150 SuperCrew
notes: This was a vehicle that was being used as a prize for a marketing contest that was being held.

title: 2012 Dodge Ram 1500
notes: I experimented with using cameras strapped to trees in order to create elevated footage of the vehicle.  I also experimented with less subtle transtions between video clips.

title: 2012 Toyota Tundra
notes: I experimented with using a lead vehicle to show exterior of showcased vehicle while driving down the road.  I experimented with alternating the colors for the information graphics in an attemtp to help keep the eye focused on the important information.
